remarks: Properties that determine a Hilbert lattice.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ishlati.1 $e |- K e. OML $.
ishlati.2 $e |- K e. CLat $.
ishlati.3 $e |- K e. AtLat $.
ishlati.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ishlati.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ishlati.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
ishlati.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
ishlati.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
ishlati.u $e |- .1. = ( 1. ` K ) $.
ishlati.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
ishlati.9 $e |- A. x e. A A. y e. A ( ( x =/= y -> E. z e. A ( z =/= x /\ z =/= y /\ z .<_ ( x .\/ y ) ) ) /\ A. z e. B ( ( -. x .<_ z /\ x .<_ ( z .\/ y ) ) -> y .<_ ( z .\/ x ) ) ) $.
ishlati.10 $e |- E. x e. B E. y e. B E. z e. B ( ( .0. .< x /\ x .< y ) /\ ( y .< z /\ z .< .1. ) ) $.
ishlatiN $p |- K e. HL $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d K x y z $.
